value.title: Add multiple missing columns if missing in Power Query

value.title: Decompress gzip files using Power BI and get access to @EU_Eurostat data.

Most data is stored in gzip files and you need to know how to decompress gzip files to be able to get the data. I will show you two methods in this video. value.excerpt: There are multiple ways that you can add a RANK column to your table, You can do that dynamically inside the Power BI report using DAX Measures, or you can do it pre-calculated.
